result.title: FLEXCoop PMV Methodology Specifications - Final Version
result.description: The deliverable will fine-tune the Performance Measurement and Verification Methodology (PMV) to be adopted by FLEXCoop for verifying consumer response rate to dispatched demand response signals, based on pilot roll out findings and following the system deployment in the pilot sites. The deliverable is an outcome of the Task 2.4.
